title: Endive - IBS FODMAP Food Diary & Symptoms Tracker
description:
Simply track what you eat, your symptoms and moods and Endive will help you identify correlations in a visual graph form.

Food is a common trigger of digestive symptoms. Avoiding certain foods or keeping a low FODMAP diet can dramatically improve issues like gas, bloating, stomach pain, diarrhoea, constipation and others.

However, everyone is different and there is no one-size-fits-all IBS diet: Keeping a diary of what you eat and how you feel is vital to learning what triggers your symptoms.

Take charge of your digestion and gut health.

üìâPERSONALISED TRACKER 
Add custom foods and symptoms that are personal to you and track them together with the others. Endive knows recipes and breaks them down into ingredients to make IBS tracking faster and more efficient.

If you have a condition you know about, but want to optimise your diet to help improve your symptoms, Endive helps you keep track of what you have eaten and how you feel, both physically and psychologically. This allows you to learn how your body reacts to different foods ü•ë, or which triggers (e.g. anxiety, depression) are causing you symptoms.

üìäWIDE RANGING TRACKER

Endive helps you manage conditions such as:

‚úÖ IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome)
‚úÖ IBD (Inflammatory Bowel Disease)
‚úÖ Food intolerance and sensitivities (such as Dairy, Wheat/Gluten, Lactose)
‚úÖ Acid reflux
‚úÖ Crohn‚Äôs disease
‚úÖ Coeliac disease
‚úÖ SIBO (Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth)
‚úÖ Ulcerative colitis
‚úÖ Migraines & cluster headaches
‚úÖ Skin issues (such as Eczema, Acne)
‚úÖ Period / menstrual cycle related issues
‚úÖ Bloating, heartburn, and many other digestive conditions

üî¨FODMAP TRACKER
Want to track your FODMAP diet? üçí
FODMAP‚Äôs are types of carbohydrates that are poorly absorbed by the body. Studies show strong links between them and digestive IBS symptoms. A low FODMAP diet can have remarkable benefits if you struggle with these issues.

If you want to take your tracking to the next level, get weekly reports with Endive Plus that highlight high and low FODMAP foods in your diet so you can learn which of them might have caused your symptoms.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

We'd love to hear your thoughts üí≠

üí°Send your questions, feedback and bug reports to feedback@endive.app
descriptionHTML:
Simply track what you eat, your symptoms and moods and Endive will help you identify correlations in a visual graph form.

Food is a common trigger of digestive symptoms. Avoiding certain foods or keeping a low FODMAP diet can dramatically improve issues like gas, bloating, stomach pain, diarrhoea, constipation and others.

However, everyone is different and there is no one-size-fits-all IBS diet: Keeping a diary of what you eat and how you feel is vital to learning what triggers your symptoms.

Take charge of your digestion and gut health.

üìâPERSONALISED TRACKER
Add custom foods and symptoms that are personal to you and track them together with the others. Endive knows recipes and breaks them down into ingredients to make IBS tracking faster and more efficient.

If you have a condition you know about, but want to optimise your diet to help improve your symptoms, Endive helps you keep track of what you have eaten and how you feel, both physically and psychologically. This allows you to learn how your body reacts to different foods ü•ë, or which triggers (e.g. anxiety, depression) are causing you symptoms.

üìäWIDE RANGING TRACKER

Endive helps you manage conditions such as:

‚úÖ IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome)
‚úÖ IBD (Inflammatory Bowel Disease)
‚úÖ Food intolerance and sensitivities (such as Dairy, Wheat/Gluten, Lactose)
‚úÖ Acid reflux
‚úÖ Crohn‚Äôs disease
‚úÖ Coeliac disease
‚úÖ SIBO (Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth)
‚úÖ Ulcerative colitis
‚úÖ Migraines & cluster headaches
‚úÖ Skin issues (such as Eczema, Acne)
‚úÖ Period / menstrual cycle related issues
‚úÖ Bloating, heartburn, and many other digestive conditions

üî¨FODMAP TRACKER
Want to track your FODMAP diet? üçí
FODMAP‚Äôs are types of carbohydrates that are poorly absorbed by the body. Studies show strong links between them and digestive IBS symptoms. A low FODMAP diet can have remarkable benefits if you struggle with these issues.

If you want to take your tracking to the next level, get weekly reports with Endive Plus that highlight high and low FODMAP foods in your diet so you can learn which of them might have caused your symptoms.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

We'd love to hear your thoughts üí≠

üí°Send your questions, feedback and bug reports to feedback@endive.app
summary: IBS & low FODMAP diet tracker made easy. Learn how food affects your digestionüçè
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Added PDF Export
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes and stability improvements
comments: Helpful for keeping track of food and symptoms but definitely not an app for a newbie. New to having to keep an eye on FODMAPS so wish it was easier to see which was what. There is the ability to pay for highlighting of this but I didn't find the highlights were on each food item. As well, the food options assume you're making things from scratch. Or some searches food items just didn't result in anything and I had to manually add each ingredient. Definitely not gonna be doing that takes forever

I've used several apps to track my IBS-C. I know the developer is still working on this app, but so far I like it. They have a great selection of food items and recipes already in the database. You can easily adjust the recipes, too. After every entry it asks you to rate your triggers (bloating, constipation, etc) which I LOVE! I'm so bad about tracking those. There is no export option yet, which I hope comes soon. Using the free version and there are no ads, either.

Found this app really disappointing. The high/low fodmap scoring is behind a paywall. Additionally I lost confidence in the food directory, hardly any of the meals I get from the supermarket are in the directory.
User experience is just really cluttered. I looked for my regular low fodmap items in the meal directory and could not find any of them. Going to keep looking for a helpful fodmap food diary
I use it for my IBS and how bloated I am etc good reminder.

title: Gluten free Recipes: Healthy Cookbook
description:
Gluten free recipes app offers you many quick and easy recipes. These include salad recipes, gluten-free sandwich recipes, soup recipes, stew recipes, gluten-free chocolate recipes, appetizer recipes, recipes for pizza and recipes for snacks.

Festive recipes
Celebrate Chinese New Year with over 100 gluten-free recipes. Also find a number of easy gluten-free recipes for any occasions like Valentine's day, American Super Bowl, Boxing day, Thanksgiving, labour day, St.Patrick‚Äôs Day.

Popular gluten-free food recipes of the month
Recipes like glazed pork and apple kebabs, pork tenderloin, shrimp salad, tex mex stuffed zucchini, Glazed Pork and Apple Kebabs, Pork Tenderloin, Shrimp Salad and Tex Mex Stuffed Zucchini are popular in January & February.

Simple gluten-free recipe instructions with picture
Every gluten-less recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get many light recipes for free in our Gluten free recipes app. Unlike other recipes app, Gluten free recipes can be used offline. This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen.

Collect favourite non-gluten recipes
Add your favourite healthy gluten-free recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved gluten-less food recipes offline. You can also create gluten-free food recipe collections on the basis of breakfast ideas, cooking and prep time, anti-gluten items, cuisine, lunch ideas etc.

Gluten-Free Recipe search
Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for gluten-less recipes with the ingredients you have. We also have Thanksgiving recipes, Christmas recipes, Halloween recipes and other recipe categories for special occasions.

Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients feature lets you search and discover non-gluten recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have healthy gluten-free recipes for people following vegetarian, gluten-free, vegan and keto diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have peanut-free recipes, egg-free recipes, wheat-free recipes, lactose-free recipes and dairy-free. Nutritional information like calories, fat, carbs and cholesterol are available in the Gluten free recipes app.

Create Meal plans
Meal planning is going to be tasty and healthy with Gluten free recipes. Start eating gluten-less food recipes with proper meal planner ideas and grocery shopping list. With simple meal planner ideas get healthy gluten-free recipes.

We offer lots of gluten-free food recipes:
Cook tasty gluten-free recipes at home using cayenne pepper, zucchini, butter & scallions. Recipes for classic gluten-less dishes like grilled skirt steak, chicken and white bean chili, honey balsamic glazed chicken, fish chowder sheet pan bake and roasted spaghetti squash are available in the app. Our favourite non-gluten recipes include crispy chicken thighs, sesame chicken, and enchiladas with pumpkin seed salsa.

Our healthy gluten-free recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for dessert, chicken, waffles etc. Now that you've our gluten-less food recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.

Start cooking with our free recipes app today.

title: mobiCeliac [Scanner]
description:
WARNING: This app ONLY includes gluten-free info for SPAIN.
--------
mobiCeliac [Scanner] is an app for your device that allows you to get gluten-free food info for SPAIN:
- Use your device camera as a reader of barcode labels (EAN13, UPC, etc) found in packaging of food & drink products and drugs/medicines you can find in SPAIN.
  This app checks automatically whether or not it is included in the Food and Drink Directory and in the Medicines Directory of gluten-free products in SPAIN.
- Learn to recognize all Food Categories and identify the gluten risk or gluten content level
- Learn to spot all product Ingredients and identify the gluten risk or gluten content level

mobiCeliac is the only gluten-free target app for Spain appearing in the "European Directory of Health Apps" promoted by the European Commission (http://www.mobiceliac.com/2013/directorio-europeo-de-aplicaciones-medicas/)

After installing the app, you will need to:
- Purchase a subscription to data updates. It includes a 7 day free trial period to access the full database
  Just select the main option "Settings"  > "License Management" and get your subscription
- Download the database
  Select the main option "Data Update", tap the "Download" button and wait until the data download finishes successfully.
Now you can access more than 20,000+ gluten-free food & drink barcodes and all medicine barcodes that are distributed or sold in SPAIN.

This app is targeted to help people suffering from Coeliac Disease (CD) or other gluten-sensitivity diseases.
The Info Guides are compatible with other Spanish Societies gluten-free products list (ACySG, SMAP and FACE)

title: Celiac recipes to take care of your health
description:
We live in a society that is increasingly intolerant of certain foods.

This happens with celiacs, they are intolerant to wheat. It is an intolerance that can lead to something more serious that is why I bring this application, to raise awareness.

They are healthy recipes, homemade, gluten-free, suitable for celiacs. They are not just recipes of dishes to cook, you will also learn pastries for the whole family, without clear gluten.

Learn another formula for baking bread, healthy homemade recipes not only for coeliacs, because the ingredients for coeliacs can be taken by other people. Unfortunately, not the other way around.

Learn to make empanadas, pizzas, churros. Be one of those chefs who can make any dish.

Make homemade diets for coeliacs, with homemade ingredients without wheat, corn flour for baking, or rice for frying. They are ingredients of all kinds that we show you in this application, healthy and natural foods, free of wheat, to cook with friends or family. Homemade gluten-free breads, suitable for celiacs and non-celiacs.

In this application we show you the best pastry videos for celiacs, all diets, suitable for cooking anyone without being an expert cook. Homemade and easy videos, with healthy foods.

Prepare a good breakfast free. These recipes are available to you for all the diets of a celiac, without forgetting the pastry. Fried kitchen for the family, a perfect breakfast.

With this application you will receive detailed advice on diets with ingredients for celiacs and also for the whole family.

title: mobiCeliac [Scanner]
description:
WARNING: This app ONLY includes gluten-free info for SPAIN.
--------
mobiCeliac [Scanner] is an app for your device that allows you to get gluten-free food info for SPAIN:
- Use your device camera as a reader of barcode labels (EAN13, UPC, etc) found in packaging of food & drink products and drugs/medicines you can find in SPAIN.
  This app checks automatically whether or not it is included in the Food and Drink Directory and in the Medicines Directory of gluten-free products in SPAIN.
- Learn to recognize all Food Categories and identify the gluten risk or gluten content level
- Learn to spot all product Ingredients and identify the gluten risk or gluten content level

mobiCeliac is the only gluten-free target app for Spain appearing in the "European Directory of Health Apps" promoted by the European Commission (http://www.mobiceliac.com/2013/directorio-europeo-de-aplicaciones-medicas/)

After installing the app, you will need to:
- Purchase a subscription to data updates. It includes a 7 day free trial period to access the full database
  Just select the main option "Settings"  > "License Management" and get your subscription
- Download the database
  Select the main option "Data Update", tap the "Download" button and wait until the data download finishes successfully.
Now you can access more than 20,000+ gluten-free food & drink barcodes and all medicine barcodes that are distributed or sold in SPAIN.

This app is targeted to help people suffering from Coeliac Disease (CD) or other gluten-sensitivity diseases.
The Info Guides are compatible with other Spanish Societies gluten-free products list (ACySG, SMAP and FACE)

comments: Best app I found for seeing if certain foods will aggravate my food sensitivities without having to scan every goddamned label and look everything up myself. Could stand to be fleshed out a bit more, but a great tool nonetheless.
This is a very addictive sites to look at ingredients but no longer possible to use it on browser unless you just browse by the category only but good to look at nutrition fact.

I began using this app when my doctor recommended I do the low fodmap diet for 6 weeks. I thought this would make shopping for specific foods a lot easier. Boy, was I wrong. It is not accurate when you scan items in the store. For example, I would scan items, and it would say to avoid this item because of a certain ingredient in it, like soy. I would then look at the ingredients on the product and nowhere would it be listed. I would not recommend this app.

So far so good! My only suggestion would be to add a filter menu to searches / scanned items / lists, which provides options for sorting by food groups, brands, descending/ascending number rating, and excellent, good, poor, etc. matches only. As it is, looking through lists and searches is a nightmare when you have a LOT of items to look through. Another helpful feature would be to add an option to filter out duplicate items in searches--I once had a search give me 10+ dupes for several items.

I was reluntant at first to try this app due to a lot of negative reviews and comments. I just found out some food allergies that is includes in lots of foods, such as wheat, and this app is a good help. It also helps with other ingredients you want to avoid, such as sugar, etc. It even shows you foods that will be good for you to choose that disclides everything, which is good for someone new to a bad allergy trying to find new foods to eat. So far, I love this app

title: Food and Symptoms Tracker - MoodBites IBS Diary
description:
MoodBites is the best food journal to track what you eat and how you feel

It is proven that the food we eat has a direct impact on how we feel. Many times, diseases such as depression, anxiety and inflammation have their roots in the food we eat. Autoimmune diseases and food allergies can not only have a significant impact on the quality of your life and health, but can also be very difficult to understand. MoodBites is meant to deal with this issue and help you learn exactly how the food you eat affects your mood and health. Tracking what you eat and how you feel couldn't be easier - you're just a few taps away from logging the foods you eat and the way you feel.

The food we eat decides whether we feel motivated, focused and sharp or lazy and foggy. Keeping track of how each individual food influences the way we feel can be difficult though - symptoms can even take days before emerging. This is why MoodBites is such an important tool in learning what effects food has on us. MoodBites will show you how the food that you ate changed your mood in the past and even in the future.

MoodBites Features:

- Simple to use: Logging what you eat and how you feel can be done in a few taps

- Smart food auto completion - save time when adding food

- In-depth mood logging: Describe exactly how you feel, both with mood ratings and symptoms

- Symptoms: Understand how the symptoms you experience are linked the food you eat

- Superior food logging: Track not only the food you eat, but also take notes about the quantity, ingredients, etc.

- Diary: Find out exactly how the food you ate affected you, both the day you ate it and for up to 7 days after you ate it

- Calendar: Easily get details about the food you ate and your moods every day

- Insights: Gain an in-depth understanding of how food affected you in the past

- Predictions: Predict how food will influence your mood in the future




 MoodBites does not collect information from the users! 

Credits:
Some graphics are taken from flaticon.com

If MoodBites has helped you live a better life please rate it and share it with the people you care about!

title: Gluten-Free Diet Recipes
description:
A gluten-free diet (GFD) is a diet that strictly excludes gluten, which is a mixture of proteins found in wheat (and all of its species and hybrids, such as spelt, kamut, and triticale), as well as barley, rye, and oats. The inclusion of oats in a gluten-free diet remains controversial, and may depend on the oat cultivar and the frequent cross-contamination with other gluten-containing cereals.

Gluten may cause both gastrointestinal and systemic symptoms for those with gluten-related disorders, including coeliac disease (CD), non-coeliac gluten sensitivity (NCGS), gluten ataxia, dermatitis herpetiformis (DH), and wheat allergy.In these people, the gluten-free diet is demonstrated as an effective treatment, but several studies show that about 79% of the people with coeliac disease have an incomplete recovery of the small bowel, despite a strict gluten-free diet. This is mainly caused by inadvertent ingestion of gluten.[10] People with poor basic education and understanding of gluten-free diet often believe that they are strictly following the diet, but are making regular errors.

In addition, a gluten-free diet may, in at least some cases, improve gastrointestinal or systemic symptoms in diseases like irritable bowel syndrome, rheumatoid arthritis, multiple sclerosis or HIV enteropathy, among others. Gluten-free diets have also been promoted as an alternative treatment of people with autism, but the current evidence for their efficacy in making any change in the symptoms of autism is limited and weak.

Gluten proteins have low nutritional and biological value, and the grains that contain gluten are not essential in the human diet. However, an unbalanced selection of food and an incorrect choice of gluten-free replacement products may lead to nutritional deficiencies. Replacing flour from wheat or other gluten-containing cereals with gluten-free flours in commercial products may lead to a lower intake of important nutrients, such as iron and B vitamins. Some gluten-free commercial replacement products are not enriched or fortified as their gluten-containing counterparts, and often have greater lipid/carbohydrate content. Children especially often over-consume these products, such as snacks and biscuits. Nutritional complications can be prevented by a correct dietary education.

A gluten-free diet should be mainly based on naturally gluten-free foods with a good balance of micro and macro nutrients: meat, fish, eggs, milk and dairy products, legumes, nuts, fruits, vegetables, potatoes, rice, and corn are all appropriate components of such a diet. If commercially prepared, gluten-free replacement products are used, choosing those that are enriched or fortified with vitamins and minerals is preferable. Pseudocereals (quinoa, amaranth, and buckwheat) and some minor cereals are healthy alternatives to these prepared products and have high biological and nutritional value. Furthermore, they contain protein of higher nutritional quality than those of wheat, and in greater quantities.

Feedback:-
If you have any suggested features or improvement, please leave a comment. In case something is not working correctly please let me know. When posting low rating please describe what is wrong to give the possibility to fix that issue.

Ads--
There are ads in this app. Images for this app are stored on the internet and this costs money. application is free, it does not promote paid version of this app, the only way to support future development is to include ads. Please treat that with understanding.

Download now for free, Enjoy and Good Luck...

title: Is It Gluten Free?
description:
This app will help you to choose Gluten free products and drinks in any shop. Find all the possible products allowed from the point of view of GF dietary laws.

Just enter the name of the product and press Search, app will scan Gluten free authorities databases for the certifications details.

Special thanks to Karina Krasovicka (http://Arbooz.lv) and Irina Rubinchik (the Latvian Celiac Society ‚ÄúLife Without Gluten‚Äù http://dzivebezglutena.lv/) for support and help.

title: My Gluten Free Recipes
description:
My Gluten Free Recipes is a totally free app that provides a selection of the best and the Healthiest Gluten-Free Recipes available around the web for the people suffering Coeliac Disease or Gluten Intolerance who follows a Gluten-Free Diet .

Gluten is a general name for proteins found in wheat and rye that helps foods maintain their shape, acting as a glue that holds food together. Gluten can be found in many types of foods, even ones that would not be expected.

This app gives you access to Hundreds of Gluten-Free Recipes that are going to be updated on monthly basis . The Recipes are broken into 7 Categories :  

Breakfast & Brunch  
Appetizers  
Bread  
Main Dishes 
Side Dishes
Desserts 

And a special menu for Favorite Recipes where you can find all your preferred Gluten-Free Dishes .

On every recipe you gonna find detailed preparation instructions and informations like Time , Servings , and Calories ..

You can make you Shopping List from the ingredients and send it via your social apps .

Enjoy Cooking and Stay Healthy :) !

title: Gluten Free Diet
description: """Resting easy   After determination of coeliac sickness, recuperating and to what extent it takes to feel better on a gluten free eating regimen can differ.   A few people feel altogether better inside a couple of days of beginning a gluten free eating routine yet a few people may see to a greater extent a continuous change in their indications or that one manifestation enhances before another.   It can take between a half year and up to five years (at times longer) for the gut harm caused by eating gluten to completely mend. A few components are believed to be engaged with the variable time taken for the gut to mend, including age and seriousness of gut harm at analysis.   On the off chance that your side effects have not enhanced or have turned out to be more regrettable since beginning a gluten free eating regimen, address your GP, dietitian as well as gastroenterologist who are best put to screen your reaction to the gluten free eating regimen.   In the event that you commit an error   Following a gluten free eating routine is a learning procedure, for you as well as for your family and companions. Missteps can happen while you're following a gluten free eating regimen, particularly on the off chance that you have just as of late been analyzed.   On the off chance that you have coeliac sickness and eat gluten by botch, you would as a rule begin side effects a couple of hours subsequent to eating it and the manifestations can last from a couple of hours to a few days. Be that as it may, the impacts fluctuate from individual to individual, and rely upon how much gluten you've eaten, how touchy you are and to what extent you have been on a gluten free eating regimen.   On the off chance that you have coeliac infection, eating gluten harms your gut. On the off chance that you commit the intermittent error and eat gluten coincidentally, it's probably not going to cause enduring gut harm."""

title: FODMAP Helper - Diet Companion
description:
FODMAP Helper - Diet Companion
This app makes identification of high and low FODMAP foods easier to help you with your FODMAP friendly diet. This can be helpful in reducing symptoms for people with IBS, Irritable Bowel Syndrome, Crohn's disease, Colitis, Lactose Intolerance and various other food intolerances, food sensitivities, and stomach problems.

Features include:
- Comprehensive list of foods and whether or not they are low FODMAP foods, to make finding foods that won't exacerbate your IBS easier.
- Search by food name and category.
- General FODMAP Diet and Irritable Bowel Syndrome, IBS, Crohn's disease, Colitis, and - 
- Lactose Intolerence and other food sensitivities info.
- Additional details on the specific breakdowns of each food and whether it is high, medium, or low in the main categories of Polyols, Oligos, Fructose, and Lactose.


Premium Features Include:
My Experience - Log your personal experience with foods to determine if a food works for you regardless of its FODMAP content. Rate whether you had a good or bad reaction to a food after eating it, then leave detailed notes so that you know for next time how said food will affect you.

Community Experience - See how the community has reacted to a food via anonymized My Experience ratings. This will let you know if the majority of users of the app had a good or bad reaction to a food.

My Experience and Community Experience data analysis - Advanced graphs and data analysis present the my experience and community experience data to you in a useful and intuitive format to show you breakdowns of good and bad reactions to the various food categories as well as what your worst foods are.

Challenge - The FODMAP Diet is an elimination diet for IBS, GI diseases, and food sensitivities. Once you've eliminated all high FODMAP foods from your diet, you can challenge foods to determine if they work for you. This lets you introduce these foods back into your regular meals one at a time and track your experience with each food after three days to determine if it will work in your FODMAP friendly diet. More details on challenges are contained within the app.

About FODMAPs and IBS
FODMAPs are short chain carbohydrates that are poorly absorbed in the small intestine, especially for people with Irritable Bowel Syndrome, IBS, Crohn's disease, Colitis, Lactose Intolerance, Gluten Intolerance, other food intolerances and stomach sensitivities. They include short chain oligo-saccharide polymers of fructose and galactooligosaccharides, disaccharides (lactose), monosaccharides (fructose), and sugar alcohols (polyols).

The term is an acronym, derived from:

*Fermentable
*Oligo-
*Di-
*Mono-saccharides
*And
*Polyols 

Although these specific carbs are naturally present in the foods we eat, diet restriction has been found to improve symptom control in people with irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) and other functional gastrointestinal disorders (FGID), such as Lactose Intolerance, Gluten Intolerance, Crohn's disease, Colitis, and other stomach sensitivities. Prior to the formation of the FODMAP concept, diet was seldom used as first line therapy for management of IBS, Crohn's, Colitis, Lactose intolerance and other FGID.

Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) is a group of symptoms‚Äîincluding abdominal pain and changes in bowel movement patterns without evidence of underlying damage. The main symptoms of IBS are abdominal pain, discomfort in association with frequent diarrhea or constipation and a change in bowel habits.


DISCLAIMER:
We do not perform any testing ourselves. All compiled data should be used as guidelines not as basis of fact. Consult your physician before beginning any new diet. This general information is not intended to diagnose any medical condition or to replace the advice of your healthcare professional.

Embrace a healthy lifestyle with some offline collection of Gluten Free Diet Recipes and satisfy your tingling taste buds with some delectable Gluten Free Recipes. Wear your apron and cook delicious Gluten Free Food in an easy, step by step way. Before that, explore the pros and cons of Gluten Free Diet and the things to remember to follow this anti-allergic diet.

Some of the Gluten Free Foods are listed below:-

‚Ä¢ Gluten Free Bagels
‚Ä¢ Crunchy Thai Fried Bananas
‚Ä¢ Diet Soup
‚Ä¢ Watermelon Sorbet
‚Ä¢ Mushroom And Cucumber Salad
‚Ä¢ Apple Omelette Pancake
‚Ä¢ Low Fat Vegan Pudding
‚Ä¢ Curryvaepilai Dosai

Application Features:-

*Cook ‚ÄúHands-Free‚Äù by just listening to the ChefChili‚Äôs instructions.

title: Gluten Free NZ
description:
Want to see what gluten-free food manufactured in New Zealand you can consume?  This app provides you with an easily-searchable database of 3000 gluten-free products manufactured in NZ.

Use one or all three drop-down lists to narrow your search by category, sub-category or brand name, or type a product into the search box to see what food or drink you can consume on a gluten-free diet.  Scroll through the list and click on a list item to see the details and an image of the product (if internet is available). 

Great for Coeliac Disease sufferers or people who are sensitive to gluten that need to change their diets.

This app was developed as part of a software development project at the Nelson Marlborough Institute of Technology.  All proceeds enable us to keep the database up-to-date as new products become available.

title: All Stomach Diseases and Treatment
description:
All stomach diseases and treatment A-Z
This app provides information on gastrointestinal diseases, digestive system diseases and stomach health tips. This medical book will provide you with proper  information on intestinal diseases, home remedies and natural cures for simple cases such as acidity.

Stomach diseases and treatment app contains detailed information, high quality pictures and diagrams  for all the diseases.The app is simple to use and does not require internet connection to function.
Some of the details explained in this medical book are the signs and symptoms of each stomach disease, diagnosis and treatment ,prevention measures and outlook.Some disorders like Celiac disease (autoimmune disease) is a medical emergency since it damages the small intestine lining. Always seek medical help from a qualified physician when you don't feel well.
This app can be used by doctors,medical assistant,therapist, students and patients as a source of information.
Do not experiment anything without the advice of a skilled clinical officer.The app only provides information on stomach and intestinal diseases and not the clinical practice guidelines.
Learn about the digestive system  in order to have a clear picture of how this stomach diseases destroy all humans digestive system.e.g.How celiac disease destroy the human small intestine lining and how to have a gluten free diet plan.This disease condition app provides all communicable and non communicable disease conditions and treatment.
This clinical diagnosis and treatment book can help prevent brain problems by providing you with  info about the brain eater stomach/intestinal worms.However, if it's late to prevent you just need to visit your doctor for  treatment.

Infection Diseases like appendicitis may require surgical procedures for removal of the spoiled appendix.We do not provide any surgical procedures like appendix surgery but we do state it.

Seek for medical emergency treatment from a qualified doctor if you have severe abdominal pain which is not relieved by over the counter drugs(OTC Medicine).Some digestive system diseases like typhoid fever which is caused by salmonella bacteria and other gastrointestinal diseases can threaten your mental health due to brain damage. On rare occasions, these infections can affect the brain resulting in serious neurological symptoms such as slurred speech and lack of muscle control.

Take note that this app cannot tell what you are sufffering from. It can only  give reliable information on varies cases. 
Diseases include:
*Celiac disease - Diagnosis and Treatment - easy gluten free recipes - gluten free diet plan
*Appendicitis
*Barrett's esophagus
*Colon Cancer
*Bloating
*Consipation - constipation remedies
*Crohn's disease
*Cyclic vomiting syndrome
*diarrhea
*Diverticulitis
*Esophageal cancer
*Gastritis
*Gastroparesis
*Acid reflux diet - acid reflux during pregnancy
*Food poisoning
*Gallstones
*Ulcerative colitis diet
*Irritable bowel syndrome(IBS)
*Hemorrhoids test and hemorrhoids treatment
*Diverticulitis treatment
*Indigestion
*Lactose intolerance - lactose intolerance diet
*Stomach cancer
*Zollinger-Ellison syndrome.
*Preventing infection at home
Stomach cancer and colon cancer cause digestion problem and affect digestion and absorption and may require intestine surgery for cure.
If you have a query please contact us via our official email: patrikatsoftech@gmail.com

title: Intol 3 - Scans Food Intolerances
description:
You put one product after another back on the shelf because you can't tolerate it?
You now know that the intolerable ingredient is hidden at the back of the table of contents, but do you still sometimes catch one?

That won't happen to you in the future, because here comes Intol 3!

Intol 3 scans lists of ingredients and immediately recognizes what you do not tolerate.

Whether at home or directly in the supermarket:
Simply hold the camera of your smartphone on the content of the packaging. The ingredients are marked in color:

Red ~ not tolerable
Orange ~ poorly tolerable
Yellow ~ moderately tolerable

A green "Tolerated" means that you can tolerate it. Scanned, checked!

The following intolerances are supported:

‚Ä¢ Lactose intolerance
‚Ä¢ Histamine intolerance
‚Ä¢ Fructose intolerance
‚Ä¢ Gluten intolerance (Coeliac disease)
‚Ä¢ Sorbitol intolerance
‚Ä¢ Salicylic acid intolerance
‚Ä¢ Glutamate intolerance
‚Ä¢ Special nutrition during pregnancy

Intol 3 also helps you during pregnancy!
When you're pregnant, special rules apply. Intol 3 helps you to recognize those foods in the jungle that you should avoid during this time.

With the Ingredients search function you can search for specific ingredients. Similar ingredients are also found and sorted by degree of intolerance.

If you want to add your own ingredients that you don't tolerate, just add them to the app settings. Intol 3 will then mark them red when scanning and searching for ingredients.


Required permissions
‚Ä¢ Camera access to scan the ingredients list
‚Ä¢ Vibration to give feedback on detected incompatible ingredients


Intol 3 is ad-free and works without mobile data, Wi-Fi or user tracking. Visually impaired people can contact the support e-mail address and receive instructions with special operating aids from Intol. 

Handicapped people can find a detailed instruction manual at https://www.intol.de/en/anleitung-fuer-sehbehinderte-menschen/



Keywords: histamine, lactose, lactose-free app, fructose, gluten-free app, celiac disease app, sorbitol, salicylic, incompatibility, intolerance, food intolerance, allergy, pregnant food, glutamate

title: mobiCeliac ARGENTINA
description:
WARNING: This app ONLY includes gluten-free info for ARGENTINA.
--------
Are you going gluten-free and living, visiting or spending some holidays in ARGENTINA? Then, this app may help you.

mobiCeliac ARGENTINA is an app for your device that allows you to get gluten-free food info for ARGENTINA. Check the info at anytime in anyplace: no Internet connection is needed when browsing the database: all data is stores in your mobile device.
Functions provided include:
- Gluten-free Food Directory (food and drink products) including 3 different search methods: by name (brand, manufacturer or product name), by scanning the barcode or by using your voice
- Gluten-free Medicines Directory including 3 different search methods: by laboratory, main drug or commercial name
- Gluten-free Cosmetics Directory including 3 categories: Tooth care, Body care and School tools/items
- Learn to recognize all Food Categories and identify the gluten risk or gluten content level
- Learn to spot all product Ingredients and identify the gluten risk or gluten content level
- Coeliac-friendly Venues Guide (shops, groceries, restaurants and hotels) including location in a map

mobiCeliac is the only gluten-free target app for Spain appearing in the "European Directory of Health Apps" promoted by the European Commission (http://www.mobiceliac.com/2013/directorio-europeo-de-aplicaciones-medicas/)

After installing the app, you will need to:
- Download the database
  Select the main option "Data Update", tap the "Download" button and wait until the data download finishes successfully.
Now you can access more than 12,000+ gluten-free food & drink products and medicine that are distributed or sold in ARGENTINA.

This app is targeted to help people suffering from Coeliac Disease (CD) or other gluten-sensitivity diseases.
The data included in the app is provided and/or checked with ANMAT (Ministry of Healthcare in ARGENTINA)

title: Gluten-Free Living
description: Gluten-Free Living is the first and only magazine completely devoted to the gluten-free lifestyle. Gluten-Free Living provides comprehensive, in-depth coverage of health, food and lifestyle topics essential to anyone following the gluten-free diet. Expert journalists with years of experience living with and writing about the gluten-free diet, and backed by an advisory board of medical and dietary experts, give you accurate, useful information about reading labels, ingredients, shopping, new products, raising a gluten-free child, scientific research, dining out and traveling. Every issue also contains numerous recipes from gluten-free cookbook authors, as well as top chefs from around the country. Gluten-Free Living is recognized as the most reliable source of gluten-free news available. It's been called "the safety net" for the gluten-free community and lauded for using "a journalistic style that earns respect and trust" from those who have celiac disease, gluten intolerance or any other reason for being gluten free.
descriptionHTML: Gluten-Free Living is the first and only magazine completely devoted to the gluten-free lifestyle. Gluten-Free Living provides comprehensive, in-depth coverage of health, food and lifestyle topics essential to anyone following the gluten-free diet. Expert journalists with years of experience living with and writing about the gluten-free diet, and backed by an advisory board of medical and dietary experts, give you accurate, useful information about reading labels, ingredients, shopping, new products, raising a gluten-free child, scientific research, dining out and traveling. Every issue also contains numerous recipes from gluten-free cookbook authors, as well as top chefs from around the country. Gluten-Free Living is recognized as the most reliable source of gluten-free news available. It's been called "the safety net" for the gluten-free community and lauded for using "a journalistic style that earns respect and trust" from those who have celiac disease, gluten intolerance or any other reason for being gluten free.
summary: The first and only magazine completely devoted to the gluten-free lifestyle

title: Diarrhea Disease
description: Diarrhea, also spelled diarrhoea, is the condition of having at least three loose or liquid bowel movements each day. It often lasts for a few days and can result in dehydration due to fluid loss. Signs of dehydration often begin with loss of the normal stretchiness of the skin and irritable behaviour. This can progress to decreased urination, loss of skin color, a fast heart rate, and a decrease in responsiveness as it becomes more severe. Loose but non-watery stools in babies who are breastfed, however, may be normal. The most common cause is an infection of the intestines due to either a virus, bacteria, or parasite; a condition known as gastroenteritis.These infections are often acquired from food or water that has been contaminated by stool, or directly from another person who is infected. It may be divided into three types: short duration watery diarrhea, short duration bloody diarrhea, and if it lasts for more than two weeks, persistent diarrhea. The short duration watery diarrhea may be due to an infection by cholera, although this is rare in the developed world. If blood is present it is also known as dysentery. A number of non-infectious causes may also result in diarrhea, including lactose intolerance, irritable bowel syndrome, non-celiac gluten sensitivity, celiac disease, inflammatory bowel disease, hyperthyroidism, and a number of medications. In most cases, stool cultures are not required to confirm the exact cause.

title: Gluten Free Today
description:
Para personas quien tienen desordenes relacionados al gluten [enfermedad celiaca (EC), sensibilidad al gluten no-celiaca, o dermatitis herpetiforme, lo cual es una manifestaci√≥n en la piel de la EC], es necesario evitar el gluten para razones de salud. Gluten es el nombre gen√©rico para ciertos tipos de prote√≠nas que se encuentran en los granos trigo, cebada, centeno, y sus derivados. Cuando una persona con enfermedad celiaca ingiere gluten, ocurre una reacci√≥n inmune, lo cual da√±a el intestino delgado y puede causar s√≠ntomas y problemas de salud en casi cualquier parte del cuerpo. A√∫n cantidades muy peque√±as de gluten pueden causar problemas, independiente de que hay s√≠ntomas obvios o no. En cuanto a la sensibilidad al gluten no-celiaca, esta es una condici√≥n que todav√≠a no est√° bien entendida, pero parece que el consumo de gluten no causa el mismo tipo de da√±o al intestino como es el caso en la enfermedad celiaca. Sin embargo, es tambi√©n necesario eliminar el gluten de la dieta, ya que su consumo tiene diversos efectos adversos en la salud.

Los siguientes granos, tal como derivados e h√≠bridos de estos granos tienen que ser eliminados de la dieta:
Trigo ‚Äì incluye variedades como: duro, espelta, emmer, s√©mola, farro, y einkorn.
Cebada
Centeno
Escoge granos y harinas que son naturalmente sin-gluten, incluyendo arroz, ma√≠z, soya, papa, tapioca, sorgo, quinua, mijo, trigo sarraceno, yuca, arrurruz, coco, tef, lino, ch√≠a y harinas de frijoles y nueces.
Investigaciones cient√≠ficas indican que avena pura y no contaminada con gluten consumida en cantidades moderadas (hasta ¬Ω taza de avena seca por dia), es tolerada por la mayor√≠a de las personas con enfermedad celiaca. Escoge avena no contaminada que es certificada sin gluten, y consulte con su m√©dico o dietista antes de incluir la avena en su dieta.
Otros alimentos que naturalmente no contienen gluten son frutas y verduras; carnes frescas, aves, y pescado; frijoles y lentejas, nueces y semillas; y productos l√°cteos sencillos. Estos alimentos en sus formas puras no contienen gluten. Versiones procesados o con sabores agregados pueden contener ingredientes con gluten.
Existen sustitutos sin gluten para alimentos que com√∫nmente son hechos de trigo, y son ampliamente disponibles en supermercados, tiendas de alimentos naturales, directamente de los fabricantes, y de sitios en el internet.
Bebidas alcoh√≥licas destiladas, vinagres destilados, y vino son seguros para incluir en la dieta sin gluten. La mayor√≠a de las cervezas, cerveza Inglesa y bebidas malteadas son hechos a base de granos que contienen gluten y NO son sin-gluten. Cervezas hechas de granos sin-gluten, como el sorgo, son sin-gluten.
 

Etiquetado de Alimentos: Como determinar si un producto es libre de gluten
Para seguir una dieta sin gluten con √©xito, es muy importante leer las etiquetas de alimentos procesadas cuidadosamente. Esto incluye afirmaciones de ‚Äúgluten-free‚Äù en los paquetes, tal como listados de ingredientes. Ya que los ingredientes se pueden cambiar en cualquier momento, es importante leer las etiquetas cada vez que haga sus compras.

Una clave para entender la dieta libre del gluten es poder convertirse en un buen lector de etiquetas de alimentos. Esto incluye tanto afirmaciones de ‚Äúsin-gluten,‚Äù igual como listados de ingredientes.

title: mobiCeliac [mini]
description:
WARNING: This app ONLY includes gluten-free info for SPAIN.
--------
This app is a handy and "lite" version of our mobiCeliac [XL] full featured app.

mobiCeliac [mini] is an app for your Android device allowing you to get information about gluten-free food resources in SPAIN:
- Gluten-free Food Directory (food and drink products)
- Coeliac-friendly Venues Guide (shops, restaurants and hotels)

The Gluten-free Food Directory contains 4,000+ products distributed or sold in SPAIN.
The Coeliac-frendly Venues Guide contains around 2,000 venues where gluten-free products and services are offered in SPAIN.

It helps people suffering from Coeliac Disease (CD) or other gluten-sensitivity diseases, to achieve a better quality of life.

title: Intol ‚Äî Scans food intolerances
description:
New: Intol Version 3
Developed from scratch with additional features: Get Intol 3

You put one product after another back on the shelf because you can't tolerate it?
You now know that the intolerable ingredient is hidden at the back of the table of contents, but do you still sometimes catch one?

That won't happen to you in the future, with Intol!

Intol scans lists of ingredients and immediately recognizes what you do not tolerate.

Whether at home or directly in the supermarket: 
Simply hold the camera of your smartphone on the content of the packaging. The ingredients are marked in color:

Red ~ not tolerable
Orange ~ poorly tolerable
Yellow ~ moderately tolerable

A green "OK" means that you can tolerate it. Scanned, checked!

The following intolerances are supported:

- Lactose intolerance
- Histamine intolerance
- Fructose intolerance
- Gluten intolerance (Coeliac disease)
- Sorbitol intolerance
- Salicylic acid intolerance
- Glutamate intolerance
- Special nutrition during pregnancy

Intol also helps you during pregnancy!
When you're pregnant, special rules apply. Intol helps you to recognize those foods in the jungle that you should avoid during this time.

With the new Ingredients search function you can search for specific ingredients.


Required permissions
- Camera access to scan the ingredients list
- Vibration to give feedback on detected incompatible ingredients
- Accessing the external memory to save settings

Intol is ad-free and works without mobile data, Wi-Fi or user tracking.


Keywords: histamine, lactose, lactose-free app, fructose, gluten-free app, celiac disease app, sorbitol, salicylic, incompatibility, intolerance, food intolerance, allergy, pregnant food, glutamate

title: Gluten Free Recipes
description:
A gluten-free diet (GFD) is a diet that excludes gluten, a protein composite found in wheat, barley, rye, and all their species and hybrids (such as spelt, kamut, and triticale). The inclusion of oats in gluten-free diet remains controversial.

Gluten Free Recipes is an application containing recipes, foodlist.. for Gluten Free diet, it is is the best Gluten Free App.

Download this wonderful android application and enjoy others from our playstore market account.


Start eating healthy and change your life!!

Go Gluten Free!!

title: ¬°Bueno para Mi! (Alergia | Intolerancia)
description:
IMPORTANTE:Solo para productos de venta en Espa√±a (no es un fallo que no reconozca los de otros pa√≠ses)

A menudo para las personas con restricciones alimentarias* les resulta bastante complicado localizar qu√© productos pueden consumir de forma segura,¬°Bueno para M√≠! ha sido creado por personas que sufren estas problem√°ticas y necesitan una soluci√≥n que les ayude eficazmente en su d√≠a a d√≠a.

*¬øRestricci√≥n alimentaria? APLV, Alergia alimentaria, intolerancia a lactosa, celiaqu√≠a, vegetariano, vegano, aceite de palma...

En Espa√±a desde 2011 existe un reglamento que obliga a los fabricantes a indicar claramente en el etiquetado de los alimentos la presencia de 14 al√©rgenos,no hay mejor manera de saber si un producto contiene estos al√©rgenos qu√© leer el etiquetado,entonces ¬øpor qu√© existe ¬°Bueno para M√≠!?

Hay necesidades m√°s all√° del reglamento,que ¬°Bueno para M√≠! se esfuerza en cubrir:

TRAZAS:El reglamento NO OBLIGA a declarar las trazas en los productos.Saber si la empresa que fabrica el producto ‚Äúremite a etiquetado" (identifica la presencia de trazas) es vital. ¬°Bueno para M√≠! facilita esta informaci√≥n

IDENTIFICAR al√©rgenos ‚Äúno oficiales‚Äù:Existen muchas alergias no cubiertas por el reglamento,los fabricantes no marcan estos ingredientes,adem√°s pueden encontrarse ‚Äúescondidos‚Äù detr√°s de t√©rminos t√©cnicos.¬°Bueno para M√≠! identifica m√°s de 50 al√©rgenos (y aumentando)

LOCALIZAR qu√© comprar:Planificar antes de ir al super es una labor compleja cuando la √∫nica forma de saber si puedes consumir algo es teniendo el envase en las manos.¬°Bueno para M√≠! Incluye un buscador de productos que adem√°s de generar un listado,marca los productos en colores seg√∫n tus necesidades.

AGILIZAR la compra:la obligaci√≥n de leer la composici√≥n de los productos suele hacer interminables las compras en el super,poder descartar r√°pidamente un producto si no es apto acelera enormemente el proceso.¬°Bueno para M√≠! solo necesita enfocar el c√≥digo de barras para decirte si no lo puedes consumir

AHORRAR:como consecuencia de poder buscar c√≥modamente en casa productos "normales" aptos para nosotros,disminuye la necesidad de comprar productos "especiales" (siempre m√°s caros)de este modo podemos ahorrar en nuestra compra

INFORMACI√ìN de fabricante: acceder r√°pidamente a la informaci√≥n que te pueda facilitar el fabricante puede ser la diferencia entre poder o no consumir un producto.En particular muchos fabricantes de chuches no est√°n obligados a etiquetar sus productos(la normativa exime a envases muy peque√±os),incluso pueden no llevar c√≥digo de barras.¬°Bueno para M√≠! te facilita el acceso a las tablas de al√©rgenos de las marcas en sus web (si est√°n disponibles)

¬øEs gratis? ¬øPorqu√©?
¬°Bueno para M√≠! es un esfuerzo de un padre para con su hija, y una forma de colaborar con la gente que tiene restricciones alimentarias. Los pilares b√°sicos de esta iniciativa:

GRATUITA: Suficiente lastre tenemos ya con nuestras restricciones como para pagar por algo indispensable.

AN√ìNIMA: No necesita registro, an√≥nimamente es 100% funcional.

SOCIAL: Si tienes un producto nuevo, modificado o con errores puedes enviar un aviso y/o informaci√≥n. 

NO HAY ALERGIA PEQUE√ëA: Si podemos detectar el al√©rgeno lo incluimos.

Para finalizar, los "n√∫meros":
- Reconoce el 90% de los c√≥digos escaneados.
- EAN: 160.000 diferentes, 85.000 alimentarios. 
- Detecta: Aceite de palma, Acido benzoico, Aditivos, Almendra, Altramuz, Anacardo, Anisakis, Apio, Aroma, Arroz, Asma, Avellana, Beb√©, Budista, Cacahuete, Cacao, Casta√±a, Cereal, Coco, Crust√°ceo, Embarazada, Especia, Fenilalanina, Fibra, Flatulencia, Fresa, Fructosa, Fruta, Frutos con c√°scara, Frutos rojos, Gelatina, Glucosa, Gluten, Guisante, Haram, Hind√∫, Hiperactividad, Huevo, Kiwi, Lactosa, Leche, Legumbre, Lenteja, Lino, LTP, Ma√≠z, Marisco, Melocot√≥n, Mercurio, Molusco, Mostaza, Ni√±o, Nuez, Pescado, Pi√±√≥n, Pistacho, Pl√°tano, Ros√°cea, S√©samo, Soja, Sorbitol, Sulfito, Taref, Tomate, Trigo, Vegano, Vegetariano, Verduras, Vit.D, Vit.E, Yuca.

*¬øRestricci√≥n alimentaria? APLV, Alergia alimentaria, intolerancia a lactosa, celiaqu√≠a, vegetariano, vegano, aceite de palma...

En Espa√±a desde 2011 existe un reglamento que obliga a los fabricantes a indicar claramente en el etiquetado de los alimentos la presencia de 14 al√©rgenos,no hay mejor manera de saber si un producto contiene estos al√©rgenos qu√© leer el etiquetado,entonces ¬øpor qu√© existe ¬°Bueno para M√≠!?

Hay necesidades m√°s all√° del reglamento,que ¬°Bueno para M√≠! se esfuerza en cubrir:

TRAZAS:El reglamento NO OBLIGA a declarar las trazas en los productos.Saber si la empresa que fabrica el producto ‚Äúremite a etiquetado" (identifica la presencia de trazas) es vital. ¬°Bueno para M√≠! facilita esta informaci√≥n

IDENTIFICAR al√©rgenos ‚Äúno oficiales‚Äù:Existen muchas alergias no cubiertas por el reglamento,los fabricantes no marcan estos ingredientes,adem√°s pueden encontrarse ‚Äúescondidos‚Äù detr√°s de t√©rminos t√©cnicos.¬°Bueno para M√≠! identifica m√°s de 50 al√©rgenos (y aumentando)

LOCALIZAR qu√© comprar:Planificar antes de ir al super es una labor compleja cuando la √∫nica forma de saber si puedes consumir algo es teniendo el envase en las manos.¬°Bueno para M√≠! Incluye un buscador de productos que adem√°s de generar un listado,marca los productos en colores seg√∫n tus necesidades.

AGILIZAR la compra:la obligaci√≥n de leer la composici√≥n de los productos suele hacer interminables las compras en el super,poder descartar r√°pidamente un producto si no es apto acelera enormemente el proceso.¬°Bueno para M√≠! solo necesita enfocar el c√≥digo de barras para decirte si no lo puedes consumir

AHORRAR:como consecuencia de poder buscar c√≥modamente en casa productos "normales" aptos para nosotros,disminuye la necesidad de comprar productos "especiales" (siempre m√°s caros)de este modo podemos ahorrar en nuestra compra

INFORMACI√ìN de fabricante: acceder r√°pidamente a la informaci√≥n que te pueda facilitar el fabricante puede ser la diferencia entre poder o no consumir un producto.En particular muchos fabricantes de chuches no est√°n obligados a etiquetar sus productos(la normativa exime a envases muy peque√±os),incluso pueden no llevar c√≥digo de barras.¬°Bueno para M√≠! te facilita el acceso a las tablas de al√©rgenos de las marcas en sus web (si est√°n disponibles)

¬øEs gratis? ¬øPorqu√©?
¬°Bueno para M√≠! es un esfuerzo de un padre para con su hija, y una forma de colaborar con la gente que tiene restricciones alimentarias. Los pilares b√°sicos de esta iniciativa:

GRATUITA: Suficiente lastre tenemos ya con nuestras restricciones como para pagar por algo indispensable.

NO HAY ALERGIA PEQUE√ëA: Si podemos detectar el al√©rgeno lo incluimos.

title: Mangiare Senza Glutine
description:
Mangiare Senza Glutine is a complete guide that allows you to quickly and easily find restaurants, pizzerias, hotels, bars, ice cream parlors that offer gluten-free around you, in Italy!

The upgrade of archive is guaranteed by a constant job placement and control. The database structure is present within the program so you do not need a connection to the internet to use the application, but only for downloading updates.

And is possible to add local users clicking on www.mangiaresenzaglutine.it, registering and submitting their reports so they are shared with all users, which can be downloaded directly to your phone.

This feature allows you to track down a list from the local region, city and town. For each of these three levels there is the possibility also show that the local location.

The search results are immediately sorted by distance from where you are, but you can also perform a search in alphabetical order.

You can also manage your favorites so you always have an eye on how far you are compared to our current position.

Tab of the single structure the top toolbar allows you to directly call the telephone number of the premises, or be guided by the navigation to your destination, then add / remove the room from your favorites.

The tab also "Parola al Gestore", where the owner of the restaurant provides his personal description and the comments section, where you can view the comments of other users (and can you, by clicking on Write in the upper right, write and immediately send your comment.)

You can also contact me for references on the website of eating gluten-free restaurants and hotels to advise or simply to propose changes and improvements to the program.

The structures in this application have been found on the internet and there is no guarantee that the same type of exercise can not change at any time. It is therefore recommended to give me immediate notice when differences are found with those reported in the application. In no case, then the application is responsible for compliance with the structural problem of celiac disease, although we strive to have consistent and updated data.

title: Gluten Free recipes with photo offline
descriptionHTML:
A gluten-free diet (GFD) is a diet that strictly excludes gluten, a mixture of proteins found in wheat and related grains, including barley, rye, oat, and all their species and hybrids (such as spelt, kamut, and triticale). Gluten is a composite of storage proteins termed prolamins.

Gluten proteins have low nutritional and biological value, and the grains that contain gluten are not essential in the human diet. However, an unbalanced selection of food and an incorrect choice of gluten-free replacement products may lead to nutritional deficiencies. Quinoa, amaranth, and buckwheat are healthy alternatives to these prepared products and have high biological and nutritional value. A gluten-free diet should be mainly based on naturally gluten-free foods with a good balance of micro and macro nutrients: meat, fish, eggs, milk and dairy products, legumes, nuts, fruits, vegetables, potatoes, rice, and maize are all appropriate components of such a diet.

Gluten Free recipes with photo offline don't require the Internet and your favorite recipes' application will always be with you, even when you haven't wi-fi.

title: Diarrhea Diet Tips Foods Help
description:
Diarrhea Diet Tips Foods Help is a free app that provides you complete information about diarrhea causes symptoms treatment dietary guidelines and remedies for the treatment. Diarrhea is not considered a disease but is a condition or symptom caused by of certain other diseases. 

Diarrhea is the frequent passage of loose, watery, soft stools with or without abdominal bloating, pressure, and cramps commonly referred to as gas. It can come on suddenly, run its course, and be helped with home care to prevent complications such as dehydration.Dysentery is diarrhea that contains blood, pus, or mucus.

You may experience diarrhea as a result of a number of conditions or circumstances. Potential causes of diarrhea include:

‚Ä¢ Food intolerance, such as lactose intolerance
‚Ä¢ Food allergy, celiac disease or gluten allergy
‚Ä¢ An adverse reaction to a medication like antibiotics
‚Ä¢ Viral infection
‚Ä¢ Bacterial infection 
‚Ä¢ Intestinal disease
‚Ä¢ Parasitic infection
‚Ä¢ Gallbladder or stomach surgery

Generally, the symptoms depend on the cause. The person may feel one or more of the following:
* Nausea
* Abdominal pain
* Cramping
* Bloating
* Dehydration
* Fever
* Bloody stools
* Mucous in stools
* Noisy stomach
* Frequent urge to evacuate your bowels 
* Large volume of watery stools

Diet modification is the major help to treat diarrhea. The person suffering with the problem needs to get proper rest and soft diet or BRAT diet but diet consistency can be modified as the condition improves. Including probiotics like curd helps in keeping gut healthy.

title: Chronic Disease
description:
Chronic Disease

Chronic illness affects the population worldwide.
Chronic Disease is a long-lasting condition that can be controlled but not cured.,prevention and control,treatment ,medication etc.
Preventing Chronic Disease (PCD) is now available as a free app on your mobile device, bringing you the latest and most relevant peer-reviewed research on public health efforts to prevent chronic disease.
Although chronic diseases are among the most common and costly health problems, they are also among the most preventable and most can be effectively controlled.
Chronic diseases generally cannot be prevented by vaccines or cured by medication, nor do they just disappear.

Ein Kochrezept (rezepte di√§t) ist eine planm√§√üige Anweisung zur Zubereitung eines bestimmten Gerichts. Kochrezepte existierten schon in vorchristlicher Zeit, zuerst in Indien, China und Griechenland. Heutzutage handelt es sich bei ihnen meist um detaillierte Arbeitsanweisungen, die in der Regel in Kochb√ºchern zusammengefasst werden. Rezepte zum abnehmen. Aber auch Rezeptsammlungen im Internet gewinnen immer mehr an Bedeutung. Jamie oliver rezepte deutsch. Heissluftfritteuse.

Im √ºbertragenen Sinn versteht man unter einem Kochrezept auch eine einfach ausf√ºhrbare Anleitung, um in beliebigem Zusammenhang ein Problem zu l√∂sen oder ein gew√ºnschtes Ergebnis zu erzielen.

title: Chomp - Check Ingredients
description:
Chomp helps you find food that's compatible with vegan, vegetarian, and gluten-free diets. Search for a food, or scan a barcode, to instantly check if it's vegan, vegetarian, or gluten free. 

Our ‚Äúdiet grade‚Äù algorithm checks each food against our comprehensive database of ingredients that we have identified as not being compatible with vegan, vegetarian, and gluten-free diets.

Chomp shows you what ingredients our algorithm flagged and why. 

Compatibility with each diet is color-coded:

Green: Indicates that we are confident that the food, or ingredient, is compatible with a diet.

Yellow: Used when we are uncertain if a food, or ingredient, is compatible with a diet. Yellow is also used if we‚Äôre missing the data we need to make a decision.

Red: Represents that we are confident that the food, or ingredient, is not compatible with a diet. These are foods you may want to avoid.

We truly believe that Chomp has the power to inform vegans, vegetarians, and people with gluten sensitivities. However, it should be stated that our algorithm is constantly being improved and we recommend that you double check the ingredient label.

recentChanges:
We opened up Chomp to everyone by allowing you to customize the ingredients we check. Add ingredients you want to avoid and we'll let you know when a food contains it.

This is especially helpful if you're not vegan, vegetarian, or avoid gluten. Now you can use Chomp to avoid ingredients that you have sensitivities toward or to just avoid an ingredient or two.
comments: I just found out about this app & immediately downloaded. It's user friendly format is designed for complete user customization & not the usual, limited "cookie-cutter" app. I'm vegan & am thrilled to have this app at my fingertips when shopping & checking EVERY ingredient on every label. All I have to do is scan the barcode & I receive my preferenced dietary report and/or alert of non-vegan ingredients. This useful tool is ESPECIALLY handy for those w/ food sensitivies and allergens.
great app but not enough ingredient info

Great idea, although I think YOU need to read the ingredients a little closer. You say Beyond Chicken isn't vegan because it has chicken in it...but if you read the ingredients, you can clearly see that it's vegan. Yeah, you have over 850,000 foods, but how many of your claims about those foods are accurate?

title: Fast Tract Diet
description:
The Fast Tract Diet App helps you identify gut friendly foods versus hard-to-digest foods, track and chart your meals and symptoms, create shopping lists and quickly look up the symptom potential for specific foods & drinks at your favorite market on the fly.

The Fast Tract Diet is based on a flexible ‚ÄúFP‚Äù point system adaptable to a variety of dietary preferences. Each food is assigned a specific point value based on its serving size and symptom potential.

The Lower The FP Points, The Lower The Symptom Potential.

The Fast Tract Diet addresses the symptoms of Functional Gastrointestinal Disorders (FGIDs), Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth (SIBO) and related digestive and general health issues including:
‚Ä¢ Gas, bloating, distension and belching
‚Ä¢ Cramps, abdominal pain and indigestion
‚Ä¢ Diarrhea, constipation or altered bowel habits
‚Ä¢ Heartburn, sore throat, sinus irritation, persistent cough, sour taste, hoarseness, lump in throat feeling and post nasal drip
‚Ä¢ Respiratory symptoms
‚Ä¢ Allergic and autoimmune reactions

FGIDs, SIBO and related digestive and general health issues include, but are not limited to:
‚Ä¢ Acid and non-acid reflux
‚Ä¢ Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)
‚Ä¢ Laryngopharyngeal Reflux (LPR)
‚Ä¢ Irritable Bowel Syndrome (IBS)
‚Ä¢ Lactose, fructose or other carbohydrate intolerance
‚Ä¢ Celiac disease
‚Ä¢ Crohn‚Äôs disease
‚Ä¢ Diverticulitis
‚Ä¢ Asthma
‚Ä¢ Rosacea
‚Ä¢ Leaky gut and autoimmune diseases

EFFECTIVE
Read the professional reviews and genuine experiences of Fast Tract Dieters (http://digestivehealthinstitute.org/book-reviews/) based on the Fast Tract Digestion books, which describe the diet. The Fast Tract Diet was presented at Digestive Disease Week in 2013 to give gastroenterologists a new dietary alternative for SIBO related conditions.

HOW IT WORKS
It‚Äôs easy. Just follow the 3 steps:
1. Decide your daily FP goal based on the severity of your symptoms.

- For severe symptoms: 25 FP points or less (GREEN)
- For moderate symptoms: 26 ‚Äì 40 FP points (YELLOW)
- For light or no symptoms: 40 FP points and above (RED)

2. Track what you eat and drink including serving sizes and any symptoms you experience.

3. Incorporate the ‚ÄúGut Friendly Practices‚Äù into your daily routine for better digestion.

For more information on FP, FP goal setting and ‚ÄúGut Friendly Practices‚Äù, read the How Fast Tract Diet Works and Gut Friendly Practices chapters by pressing ‚Äù ? ‚Äù on the Dashboard.

DASHBOARD
This is where you start. The graph is automatically generated based on your meals (FP) and symptoms. You can see it either by week or month to track your progress on symptom relief over time.

FP FOOD LIST
Over 800 foods, drinks, condiments and supplements are already pre-calculated to help you meet your ‚ÄúFP‚Äù goal for relief.

TRACKER
Your meals and symptoms are logged here. You can log meals and symptoms from the Dashboard, FP Food List as well as within the Tracker.

MY CUSTOM FOODS
Can‚Äôt find a food in the FP Food List? Enter the nutritional facts and let the App calculate the FP and save it for future use.  You can also create your own recipes. The FP values are automatically calculated per serving making it easy to add to the Tracker.

SHOPPING LIST
Create a low FP shopping list and bring it to your local market! You can also add other household items for convenience.

FP CALCULATOR
This is your mobile food chemist to determine the FP points and symptom potential in any food, drink, etc. Once FP points are calculated, you can add the food to My Custom Foods for future reference.

FAST TRACT DIET
Read about the Fast Tract Diet and Fast Tract Diet App in several concise chapters. Additional resources including books, individual consultation and a community of Fast Tract Dieters on Facebook are also found here.

Credits for various Icons
- https://icons8.com/
- http://www.flaticon.com/
  Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
  Icon made by Picol from www.flaticon.com

comments: I downloaded this app today and find it VERY useful. I can add all my favorite foods (the ones that aren't already on the app's list) and there is a calculator that allows you to figure out your favorite snacks. I was surprised that most of the "healthy" snack bars I was eating were high FP. There are even suggestions for eating out. I definitely recommend this app.

It's hard to "rate" your symptoms, especially if they don't ever stop. Also if you're not consistent with your rating scheme it's not easy to track if you're actually getting better or what foods are bothering you. I'm at 2wk using the app and I'm feeling better but not 100%. I still belch frequently and have a low level of heart burn all the time and I don't go over ~20 points a day.

I tried this diet on a whim, as a last ditch effort to avoid taking prilosec. I had been suffering from painful reflux for over two months. My ENT said the acid was reaching my voice box, which was why my voice was hoarse. I couldn't barely read my kids a book üò≠ I kept thinking "but I eat healthy! why is this happening to me?" It turns out I was eating too many carbs and way too much fiber. I've been on the diet for 10 weeks now and I no longer need meds! I highly recommend the FTD.

Very much enjoy using this app, along with the book that I imported from Amazon in the US. There are manual ways to calculate the FP points but we are finding that we have to do that more and more as there isn't as much variety in the foods and drinks that we would like.  I suppose living in the UK there are going to be some issues like that, some foods seem to be American orientated.  Then there are some oddities like prepared porridge oats, prepared with what - water or whole milk or skimmed milk etc..?   Good app overall and compliments the book well, for an understanding as to why FP points could be important to your digestive health.  I wonder if this app is due for an update anytime, and if so what might be included....?

I like the app even though there are still foods missing like couscous, napa cabbage, and probably much more, it has a feature to add custom foods but the app doesn't accept decimal points (like 1.5g), and it's almost impossible to find the sugar alcohol content of many foods. It's an excellent start and I hope Norm doesn't give up on this app which has tremendous potential to achieve mainstream status.

These gluten-free recipes for appetizers, main dishes, desserts and more are guaranteed to please. Find healthy, delicious gluten-free recipes including snacks, main dishes and desserts and more. Find recipe inspiration, cooking idea, create grocery lists, showcase your favorite recipes. All of the recipes have been tried and tested by home cooks just like you, and makes it easy to whip up your favorites wherever you go!


Have all your favorite recipes in one place

Never have to dig through old cookbooks or go through your Internet history to find recipes again. Now all of your favorite recipes can live in one location. You can mark existing recipes as a favorite or save to try for later.

Manage your grocery list

Create a grocery list for yourself or share it with your household. Items are sorted by recipe and can be marked off while you shop.

Download for free today!

Find recipes that cater to your diet and lifestyle with recipe search filters.

Share Recipes with Your Friends

Found a great recipe and want to share it with your friends? Gluten Free Recipes: Gluten Free cake, chicken offers sharing of your favorite recipes to Pinterest, Facebook or email - give it a try!

Gluten free recipes for dessert, dinner, casseroles, appetizers, breads, breakfasts, pastries, plus snacks and even candies. Maybe you just want to make a gluten free dinner tonight that your kids will love, you‚Äôre preparing for a fancy dinner party.

Click each category page to see what‚Äôs inside that category, then into each individual recipe from there.

These are the tested, easy-to-follow gluten free recipes you‚Äôve been searching for. They‚Äôll never know that everything is gluten free, because ‚Äúgood, for gluten free‚Äù hasn‚Äôt been good enough for a long, long time.

title: Fooducate - Eat better. Lose weight. Get healthy.
description:
Lose weight and keep it off. Eat tasty, healthy, real food. Track your calories, macros, and workouts. Get motivation from the most supportive community in the world. 

Fooducate is the only app that analyzes and recommends foods based on their ingredient quality. No more tricks by sneaky food manufacturers!

THE BEST NUTRITION & HEALTH TRACKER
+ A meal tracker and so much more
+ Track your food intake and exercise 
+ Track the quality of calories
+ Track your macros: protein, fats, carbs

HUGE FOOD DATABASE
+ Scan over 250,000 product barcodes 
+ Get a personalized nutrition grade (A, B, C, or D) for each food
+ Get suggestions for healthier foods based on what you scan

THE BEST DIET TIPS
+ Free health & diet tips from nutrition professionals
+ Free weight loss tips
+ Motivation, love & support from the community

FOODUCATE TEACHES YOU TO EAT FOR HEALTH!
Fooducate analyzes information found in product nutrition panels and ingredient lists. Scan to discover things manufacturers don't want you to notice:
- added sugars
- artificial sweeteners such as aspartame
- trans fats 
- high fructose corn syrup 
- MSG
- controversial food colorings 
- GMO - genetical modified organisms (premium feature) 
- additives and preservatives 
- and more... 

THE BEST WEIGHT LOSS APP
‚Ä¢ 1st prize - US Surgeon General's Healthy App Challenge 
‚Ä¢ Featured multiple times on the Google Play store
‚Ä¢ Media praise: USAToday, NYTimes, Dr. Oz, Oprah, WSJ, ABC, FOX,. . . 
‚Ä¢ Recommended by doctors, dietitians, fitness trainers, and your friends 

PERSONALIZE FOODUCATE
- age, gender,weight, height, activity level
- desired weight loss rate
- carb control
- health conditions (low cholesterol, pregnancy,...)
- dietary goals (non processed foods, vegetarian)
- avoid MSG, HFCS, GMOs and other ingredients
- Gluten free and other allergens
(Note: some personalization features require a premium account)

IN-APP PURCHASES
Get the most out of Fooducate with these premium features:

* Pro
‚Äî> Low-carb diet
‚Äî> Keto
---> Paleo
----> Mediterranean diet
‚Äî> GMO warnings
‚Äî> Priority support
‚Äî> No ads.

* Gluten & Allergies
‚Äî> Gluten-free diet
‚Äî> Uncover gluten and allergens in your food
‚Äî> Choose allergen free alternatives
‚Äî> Includes gluten, milk, lactose, soy, peanuts, tree nuts, eggs, fish, and shellfish
‚Äî> Priority support. 

* Diet Kickstart
‚Äî> 10 day plan to help you get started with weight loss

* Pet Food 
‚Äî> choose the healthiest food for your dog and cat

comments: This is such a great idea, and I can see the developers are really putting their hearts and souls into this. Unfortunately, the mobile app component doesn't quite work the way I would like it to, and maybe that's just me. 1) I spent an hour exploring the features and how to do everything, and there were just way too many rabbit holes I fell into - oops, that didn't do quite what I thought it would - backtrack, start over. I would like to see more simplicity. 2) I'm disappointed you have to get the app to get the Health Tracker feature. I can see the benefit of being able to gather information on the fly without having to visit your desktop computer, but when there's a lot of typing involved (for searches and such) it would be nice to be able to manage that date from my desktop computer. 3) When I first signed up for this, I envisioned a tracking feature that, once I entered everything I ate on a given day, would give me a summary of all the nutrients included in all I ate that day. I only found calories, fats, carbs, and [some other thing I can't remember now]. You can make that a pro feature, but I did not see where you have done this. 4) I would have strongly considered the Pro version if it included a "low fat" profile.

On Android, when you click Contact Us, it gives me options to share content via other apps?? No info on how to contact the Devs about issues. Also, if I scan a barcode that's not in the system, it asks me to take 3 pictures. After I do, I get the same issue as the Contact Us button, with a pop up to share content. So I can only add food by searching for it and clicking add food at the bottom of the screen. Otherwise the app is good. The UI could be cleaned up a bit, but I'm happy with it so far.

I thought this app was a really great idea and I still think it is but it doesn't seem like anybody is really putting any work into it there's a lot of good foods out there that they're saying is bad for no good reason they're foods out there that are slightly processed or have a little bit of added sugar that are way better than a lot of other things but they're going to make you think that it's not good because it's slightly processed. processed doesn't mean bad

It wouldn't keep my manual changes to calories and target date, etc. When I went to "contact us," it kept taking me to a quick share option that didn't provide me with any email or other form of contact information. Very frustrating

Such a great app not only for tracking my food, but also for finding better options when it comes to some foods. I love that you can scan the barcode on a package (most packages) and get a letter grade and explanation for it's grade (whether it's preservatives, added sugar, etc). And as mentioned, it will offer alternatives to the scanned item so that you might be able to find a similar but healthier option. I do pay for premium now but even before that I found the app immensely helpful shopping

title: Gluten free breakfasts
description: Gluten is a general name for the proteins found in wheat (wheatberries, durum, emmer, semolina, spelt, farina, farro, graham,..), rye, barley and triticale ‚Äì a cross between wheat and rye. Gluten helps foods maintain their shape, acting as a glue that holds food together. Gluten can be found in many types of foods, even ones that would not be expected.
